Header: Sajith Premadasa assures to establish an administration that provides all privileges to the people
Content: Presidential Candidate Sajith Premadasa says an administration that provides all privileges which were given so far to the rulers to the people, will be established on the 16th of this month. He said this during a public rally at the Kesbewa area which was attended by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe. Several people addressed the meeting to ensure the victory of Mr. Sajith Premadasa. A large group of people attended the public rally. Addressing the gathering Mr. Sajith Premadasa said that he not prepared to make politics to earn an income. Speaking at the rally Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe said that the future of the people has been stabilized after ruling the country for the last five years. What has to be decided whether to protect that stability or whether to destroy it. Addressing the gathering Presidential Candidate Sajith Premadasa said that they hope to provide a selfless service to the public during their administration. He said that the President and the Parliamentarians would sacrifices their privileges for the common people. The duty free permit will not be given to the public representatives. Bringing down vehicles for the Ministries with the change of governments will also be stopped. He pointed out that they will not be doing a job but they will be performing a temporary custodian role. He added that politics should not be an employment but a service to the nation.
